pl.grm.boll.lib

Interface LauncherDB

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface LauncherDB
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface which extend Remote of RMI controller to game BOL.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfExists

        Result checkIfExists(java.lang.String login)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Ensures that in database is @param login. If exists than will return the same name from database in Result->String.

        If not it will be empty.

        If there will be an exception than Result->exception would be not null.

        Returns:
        Result
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        Returns:
        Result with boolean true if both params are equal.

        java.rmi.RemoteException
